title: missing files on my device nightly
content:
hello. support has refused to help with my issue and i am having trouble finding out how to report an issue with Android - the issue is the same on my old ZTE phone and my current Pixel phone made by Google. 
I copy video clips to my phone memory - the Movies folder - to watch later. 
each night one or more files in that folder disappear.
Google recommended that i backup the folder with Google Photos - did that - no change - still lose random files overnight. 
Since it is affecting multiple phones it must be a software issue or Android related.
PLEASE tell me how to fix this major security issue - files should ne be disappearing from my phones storage area.
i need to work with someone on monitoring the folder for changes so we can determine why those files are disappearing with no warning.
ia have the following case numbers: 3-9766000030922 3-6290000030547
thanks
